summary: Just another city for my \"Recolored\" series
descriptionHtml:
This is just another city.  While it didn\'t turn out quite as stunning as some of the others, I like it...particularly for indoors.  It is a bit over saturated on the exteriior, so it may or may not fit your tastes.  But this is how my Markarth would look.  :)  I imagine this place as being a marvel, and what better way for it to be spectacular and marvelous than to bring out the many colors?
I hope you guys will enjoy this one, and please check out all of my other recolored towns.  :D
Also, I don\'t have any before/after pics for now, but the difference is very visible.  :)



PS:  Just an extra note....I will be submitting all of these cities together soon as a complete package.  I just have a few more holds to do, and it will be good to go.  :)
author: Stephanie Young
